content: {"name": "Jewish Family Services", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Serves the Jewish community; not open to the public but they will provide one-time, emergency assistance even if you are not Jewish. The day & time you can pick up food will be determined when you call to register.", "email": "", "url": "https://jfscharlotte.org/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "5007 Providence Road", "address_2": "Suite 105 ", "city": "Lansdowne", "state_province": "NC", "postal_code": "28226", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 35.146759, "longitude": -80.7894767}, "phones": [{"number": "(704) 364-6594", "type": "voice"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Call in advance for services"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Only serves the Jewish community"}]}
